rule_form_rule_continue_label: And continue the processing of rules
rule_form_rule_continue_tooltip:
When the conditions of this rule are met, it is applied.
If this option is enabled, the following rules will also be evaluated.
Otherwise, the evaluation stops here.
description: Define your distribution rules to choose which contacts will receive the communications, based on the categories and priorities you select.
add_routing_error_message: An error occurred while creating the rule.
add_routing_info: By default, messages are sent to the main contact entered in your customer area. You can create exceptions here.
edit_routing_error_message: An error occurred while modifying the rule.
delete_routing_error_message: An error occurred while deleting the rule.
delete_routing_modal_info: Are you sure you want to delete the rule {{ routingName }} ?
rule_form_active_label_tooltip: Enable this option to apply the distribution rule. If you disable it, the rule will not be applied. You can enable it later
rule_form_rules_error_message: At least one condition is required
